title: Good afternoon! A sunny day here in Louisville, and I am ready to transition from my busy day and ...

attachments.displayName:
Good afternoon! A sunny day here in Louisville, and I am ready to transition from my busy day and humbly present our petitions to Jesus. I will be praying the Rosary @ ~ 3:05 if you would like to join me in prayer. Will you keep watch with me?

While meditating on the Joyful Mysteries, I humbly and lovingly persist in asking for the Lord's graces: for Emily; for my loving parents; for my brothers; for Galina's family; for Marilyn who has cancer; for Sandy and Cathy; for Angela; for the Miles family; special prayer requests for Shelly & her father, Donald Darby Sr. and family, the Wheatly family, Chrissy (special intention), Carla & Heapify; for Linda Harris' daughter; for church members Father B.J., Robert A., Paula L., Ginny W., Slim W., and Mary O.; for peace in Syria and Egypt; for Pastor Saeed Abedini (his release appears to be closer now); for Amanda Berry, Gina DeJesus and Michelle Knight; a special petition for Josie, Michael, Lissa and Nikki; for Anna, Larissa, Dustie, Alona, Barbara, Pamela, Bobbie Jo, Isolde, Wykethia, Pearl, Geert-jan, Micara, Dishamom, Zain, Fathima, Kathy, Tazein, Brenda, Eliis, Lilyn, Sunny, Arlene and my many dear Google+ friends; and for my silent petition ... today and forever I fondly pray for the 7 gifts of the Holy Spirit for you (=^_^=)

If you would like me to pray for you I will gladly intercede for you ... either silently or I will include them here. And please pray for me and my dear future wife (I don't know her yet, but God knows who she is). Praise and thanks, Lord Jesus ...

object.content:
Good afternoon! A sunny day here in Louisville, and I am ready to transition from my busy day and humbly present our petitions to Jesus. I will be praying the Rosary @ ~ 3:05 if you would like to join me in prayer. Will you keep watch with me?

While meditating on the Joyful Mysteries, I humbly and lovingly persist in asking for the Lord's graces: for Emily; for my loving parents; for my brothers; for Galina's family; for Marilyn who has cancer; for Sandy and Cathy; for Angela; for the Miles family; special prayer requests for Shelly & her father, Donald Darby Sr. and family, the Wheatly family, Chrissy (special intention), Carla & Heapify; for Linda Harris' daughter; for church members Father B.J., Robert A., Paula L., Ginny W., Slim W., and Mary O.; for peace in Syria and Egypt; for Pastor Saeed Abedini (his release appears to be closer now); for Amanda Berry, Gina DeJesus and Michelle Knight; a special petition for Josie, Michael, Lissa and Nikki; for Anna, Larissa, Dustie, Alona, Barbara, Pamela, Bobbie Jo, Isolde, Wykethia, Pearl, Geert-jan, Micara, Dishamom, Zain, Fathima, Kathy, Tazein, Brenda, Eliis, Lilyn, Sunny, Arlene and my many dear Google+ friends; and for my silent petition ... today and forever I fondly pray for the 7 gifts of the Holy Spirit for you (=^_^=)

If you would like me to pray for you I will gladly intercede for you ... either silently or I will include them here. And please pray for me and my dear future wife (I don't know her yet, but God knows who she is). Praise and thanks, Lord Jesus ...
